original_text: The soldiers twisted together a crown of thorns and put it on his head. They clothed him in a purple robe
korean_text: 군인들이 가시나무로 관을 엮어 그의 머리에 씌우고 자색 옷을 입히고

sentences.original_text: The soldiers twisted together a crown of thorns
and put it on his head
They clothed him in a purple robe
